name: ORS Activities with Capacity
description:
Report displays Activities, their Capacity and Vacancies at a selected establishment
ACT0047 - v3.0 Last Modified: 08/08/2023

dataset.name: Current Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.DESCRIPTION, V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE, AT_SLOT_REFERENCE.DESCRIPTION AS SLOT, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CODE, AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION AS SERVICE_DESCRIPTION FROM V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_SCHEDULES AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROGRAM_PROFILES AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_SLOT_REFERENCE, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, OMS_OWNER.PROGRAM_SERVICES AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_SCH_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_SCH_ID AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.CRS_ACTY_ID = AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID) AND (AT_COURSE_SCHEDULES.SLOT_CATEGORY_CODE = AT_SLOT_REFERENCE.CODE (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.PROGRAM_ID = AT_PROGRAM_SERVICES.PROGRAM_ID) AND (AT_SLOT_REFERENCE.DOMAIN (+) = 'PA_SLOT') AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFF_PRGREF_ID = V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.OFF_PRGREF_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_STATUS IN ('CANC', 'SUS')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_PROGRAM_PROFILES.OFFENDER_END_DATE >= TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) AND V_OFFENDER_COURSE_EVENTS.EVENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('27-06-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-07-2023 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, EVENT_DATE, SLOT, CODE, SERVICE_DESCRIPTION, PRISON_ACTIVITIES.CAPACITY AS V_CAPACITY, 'TBD' AS V_AM_SLOT, COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_SLOT = 'AM') AS V_COUNT_NOMS_NO_AM, 'TBD' AS V_PM_SLOT, COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_SLOT = 'PM') AS V_COUNT_NOMS_NO_PM, CASE WHEN V_SLOT = 'AM' THEN V_VACANCY_AM ELSE ' ' END AS V_VACANCY_AM_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN V_SLOT = 'PM' THEN V_VACANCY_PM ELSE ' ' END AS V_VACANCY_PM_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN V_SLOT = 'ED' THEN V_VACANCY_ED ELSE ' ' END AS V_VACANCY_ED_DISPLAY, 'TBD' AS V_ED_SLOT, COUNT(OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) OVER (PARTITION BY V_SLOT = 'ED') AS V_COUNT_NOMS_NO_ED FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Capacity
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CAPACITY, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CAPACITY - DT_COURSE_VACANCY.RESGISTRATION_COUNT AS VACANCY, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.COURSE_ACTIVITIES AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES, (SELECT crs_acty_id, COUNT(*) AS resgistration_count FROM offender_program_profiles WHERE offender_program_status = 'ALLOC' GROUP BY crs_acty_id) DT_COURSE_VACANCY WHERE (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.CRS_ACTY_ID = DT_COURSE_VACANCY.CRS_ACTY_ID (+)) AND (AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND CASE WHEN AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR AT_COURSE_ACTIVITIES.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END = 'Y')), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, CAPACITY, VACANCY, AGY_LOC_ID, CODE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (SERVICE_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL))
